CMBetaClass Interface Reference

CM beta class interface. More...

Public Member Functions

 __toString ()
 Return the string value of this object.

Detailed Description

CM beta class interface.

Description

Any class that is unfinished, untested or for some other reason is not deemed stable inherits from this class. This is mainly for documenation purposes, but it also allows the programmer to test at runtime if a class is stable.

Example 1: Testing if a class is stable.

 if(CMFileCSV instanceof CMBetaClass)
   trigger_error("It is not recommended you use this beta class", E_WARNING);
Author:
Elliot Chance
Since:
1.0
